meanings.definition: Feeling or expressing sorrow or regret
meanings.sent1: The ruefulness expression on her face showed how sorry she felt.
meanings.sent2: He had a ruefulness look after realizing his mistake.
meanings.sent3: Despite his ruefulness, his friends tried to cheer him up.
meanings.sent4: The ruefulness clouds in the sky matched his somber mood.
meanings.sent5: The ruefulness in her voice made everyone feel her regret deeply.
